homeContent.title-1: Are you thinking about taking out a mortgage loan?
homeContent.paragraph-1: When someone goes to a bank looking for mortgage financing, they often encounter a lot of terms and paperwork that are difficult to understand and manage. It’s a tough process for people who are not familiar with the financial world. That’s why it’s important to take the time to understand and study it. Remember, these are products you may be tied to for a long time. It’s essential to know exactly what you’re being offered before making a decision.
homeContent.title-2: We know this process is difficult and discouraging, but with the help of our service, we hope you can make the best decision.
homeContent.title-3: How do I generate a report?
homeContent.paragraph-2-1: To generate a report, go to the
homeContent.paragraph-2-2: section and fill out the requested information in the form. This will allow you to simulate and calculate your mortgage loan in detail and get a complete PDF report with detailed information. Don’t worry if you don’t understand something — you can always go to the
homeContent.paragraph-2-3: section to look up any concepts.

homeContent.title-6: Can I view the reports I’ve generated?
homeContent.paragraph-3-1: You can always view all the reports you’ve generated in the
homeContent.paragraph-3-2: section (we recommend generating as many reports as you have proposals from banks).
homeContent.paragraph-4: In this section, you’ll be able to see a table with all the reports you've generated so you can compare proposals, see which one you prefer, etc.
homeContent.paragraph-5: Additionally, you can always recover any PDF reports you generated but no longer have access to for any reason. Just click the PDF download link shown in the table in this section.
